item.title: Windows VirtualBox Install Process
item.description:
1. Install
  2. Update
  3. Remove Unused Programs
  4. Turn off hibernation
powercfg.exe -h off

insert windows 11 installation media cdrom/iso

item.title: Installing Windows 11 on Virtualbox
item.description:
Settings that worked for me

Skip unattended installation 200gb vhd (flexible size) 8192 Mb Ram TPM: None EFI On Enable Secureboot: No

item.title: Shrinking Virtualbox Hard Drives

Derived from these instructions on HowToGeek

In this tutorial we assume a linux host and a windows guest

item.title: VSCode Setup and Usage
item.description:
Installation

Download from here

Installation Options

  • Accept the default installation path
  • keep “Register Code as an editor for supported file types” checked
  • keep “Add to PATH” checked
  • other options: set to your preference

Ubuntu-specific

cd ~/Downloads
sudo dpkg -i code_1.7* #.... tab complete
sudo apt install -yf
